text: O towniri mawɓe makko ɓen ɗiɗo ka belorki(danki), ɓe naayirani mo sujjugol. O maaki:"Ko onon yo baaba'en, ko ɗum ɗoo woni firo koyɗol am ngol oya tuma, gomɗii Joomi am waɗii ngol goonga. Gomɗii O moƴƴike e am tuma O yaltinnoo lam ka kaso, O itti on ka ladde, ɓaawo nde seytaane bonnii hakkunde am e ben-gootooɓe am ɓen. Pellet, Joomi am ko newaniiɗo ko O muuyi kon. Ko Kanko woni Annduɗo, Ñeeñuɗo
